snippet: Tom Brady's two-year contract extension with the Patriots will give him a $28 million signing bonus and adds $41 million to his deal should he play it out....
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady's two-year contract extension with the Patriots will give him a $28 million signing bonus and adds $41 million to his deal should he play it out.

headline.main: Brady Signs New Deal, Gets $28 Million Bonus
headline.print_headline: Brady Signs New Deal, Gets $28 Million Bonus
